alert.note: Alert for Baker; Coastal Duval; Hamilton; Inland Nassau; Northern Columbia; South Central Duval; Southern Columbia; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:20AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of western Nassau, Baker, northwestern Clay, northeastern Columbia, western Duval, east central Hamilton, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and southeastern Charlton Counties through 300 AM EDT... At 220 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Callahan to 8 miles east of Taylor to 7 miles northeast of Watertown. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Hilliard, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Taylor, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Maxville, Cisco Gardens and Olustee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Coastal Duval; Hamilton; Inland Nassau; Northern Columbia; South Central Duval; Southern Columbia; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval
